name: May B. Aweley
home_region: Germany (Berlin; also time in Lower Saxony mentioned in interviews/press)
bio_short: Thriller author writing under the pseudonym May B. Aweley (also May Brooke Aweley / Nora Richter). Known for suspense-focused thrillers; several works follow an FBI-team set in New York City; books are written to be self-contained (no cliffhangers) but can be read in publication order.
notes: The author bio on LovelyBooks states the series reading order for the NYC/FBI-team books and that the books are standalone (no cliffhangers).
Press/interviews indicate Polish roots and that the pen name is used partly to separate private life and author life.
